coreAttributes.authorTag: A faint inscription printed on the packaging reads 'Packed by DSG Foodstuffs LLC'
coreAttributes.name: Pâté and Crackers
coreAttributes.description: A small tin of meat pâté and crackers wrapped in a wax paper package. The label on package is a cartoony depiction a smiling grypon-boy with crumbs all around his beak.

useDescriptions.selfUse: #IF(game.isSillyModeEnabled()) [npc.speech(Okay, let's get this out of the packaging,)] [npc.name] [npc.verb(say)] to an unseen audience before unpacking the crackers and opening the tin. The tin makes a slight hiss as air rushes in. [npc.speech(Nice hiss,)] [npc.she] [npc.verb(comment)]. #ELSE [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unpack)] the crackers and [npc.verb(open)] the tin. #ENDIF [npc.She] [npc.verb(breathe)] in the hearty scent of crackers just out of the oven and freshly cooked meat. Unable to resist the delicious looking meal, [npc.she] quickly [npc.verb(devour)] it all, leaving only an empty tin and torn wax paper behind.
